Uses of Class
biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2.FileLoadersOptionBuilder

  • Packages that use FileLoadersOptionBuilder 
    Package Description
    biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2
    The LessCSS Compiler compiles Less source files to CSS code.

    • Uses of FileLoadersOptionBuilder in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2

      Methods in biz.gabrys.lesscss.compiler2 that return FileLoadersOptionBuilder 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder FileLoadersOptionBuilder.withClassPath()
      Appends the ClassPathFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder FileLoadersOptionBuilder.withCustom(Class<? extends FileLoader> clazz)
      Appends a custom file loader implementation at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder FileLoadersOptionBuilder.withFtp()
      Appends the FtpFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder FileLoadersOptionBuilder.withHttp()
      Appends the HttpFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder FileLoadersOptionBuilder.withLocal()
      Appends the LocalFileLoader at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loader again.
      FileLoadersOptionBuilder FileLoadersOptionBuilder.withStandard()
      Appends standard file loaders at the end or does nothing if you try to add the same file loaders again.
